## OPage.requireLogin() method

Does this page require a verified user for the requested page route.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requireLogin?(context: OWebRouteContext, route: OPageRouteFull<Route>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | OWebRouteContext | The app context. |
|  route | [OPageRouteFull](./oweb.opageroutefull.md)<!-- -->&lt;Route&gt; | The request page route. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
